title: @Riot, Beautiful Vandal Skins?
body:
Any chance they'll go back up for sale... ever? Still need to collect Vandal Vlad.

They're also some of the most badass skins in League...

replies.body: LOL, I got mystery gifted yesterday and it was a vandal vlad. Haha.

Good morning! 

These skins are legacy, which means they'll likely make an appearance in the store again - probably when the Legacy Vault is opened! Keep an eye out!
